timeline.bodyText: This is good, I think "records" works well in this context. FWIW, that's the term I found in the field to be most comfortable to users, who often think of "documents" as being things they create with Word and Powerpoint.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: I think we can say "entity" here, but "record" is still safe, as "record" is always a safe generalization.
